attributes.action: Save The Street! Give Coronation Street Listed Status before it's too late
attributes.additional_details:
Help protect the thirty-two year old Quay Street Coronation Street set!. We would like the Government to support application 483656 to English Heritage for ‘Listed’ status to be given to the existing Quay Street set and thus protect it from demolition. Sign this petition to help create a platform within the House of Commons for this to be discussed, and to help the Government understand the true importance this set has for Manchester and The North of England and the whole world.

The set is currently unprotected as a historical and cultural asset to both the city and the country. Within 12 various oligarchplans currently proposed for the site, there has been NO attempt to incorporate the old Coronation Street set in ANY of the submissions, thus implying an intent to demolish. The façade is of international importance and it is arguably the most recognisable street in the world. Too much of Manchester's heritage has already been lost over the last few decades.

#savethestreet

rejection.details: This is a matter for English Heritage alone.
